language.title: Trilingual Education System
language.subtitle: The three-language integration program at AGS Kindergarten is designed to facilitate children's language development through a comprehensive and contextual learning approach. Each week we alternate focus on one language, while certain subjects consistently use the same language.
language.approach: All three languages are introduced through immersion methods and theme-based learning relevant to children's lives, enabling children to develop strong language skills and become more confident in using these languages in various contexts.
language.methods: Learning activities are designed to facilitate children's language development through various methods such as language games, children's songs, picture stories, and collaborative projects that encourage children to use language in meaningful contexts.

arabic.desc: Teaching Arabic language, Islamic education, and Quran recitation through the Nurul Bayan method with emphasis on proper pronunciation and tajweed.

english.desc: Cambridge curriculum for sciences, mathematics, and global communication, developing fluency and confidence in international contexts.

indonesian.desc: National curricula (Kurikulum Merdeka), arts, local culture, and character strengthening based on Pancasila student profile.

safe_start.title: A Safe Start For Active And Balanced Learning
safe_start.subtitle: Islamic education and character building are the main pillars in the learning model at Arabic Global School's Playgroup and Kindergarten levels. This approach is based on the Montessori method which emphasizes independence, active involvement, and respect for children's developmental stages.
safe_start.philosophy: AGS prioritizes the development of independence, confidence, and joy of learning from an early age. We support children's growth through engaging activities appropriate to their developmental stages, covering five key areas: Physical, Cognitive, Language, Social-Emotional, and Creativity.

kindergarten.title: Kindergarten
kindergarten.desc: Comprehensive and interactive learning activities covering arts, literacy, numeracy, science, and social-emotional skills through Montessori-based experiential learning that emphasizes autonomy and independent exploration.

primary.title: Primary School
primary.desc: At Arabic Global School (AGS), primary school is not just an academic stage, but a crucial period in forming a child's identity, mind, and soul. We believe that true education not only teaches knowledge, but also cultivates love of learning, thinking ability, and noble moral values.

intermediate.title: Intermediate School
intermediate.desc: Advanced learning with specialized subjects and leadership opportunities

cognitive.title: Cognitive Development
cognitive.desc: Recognizing basic math concepts (numbers, shapes, sizes). Developing problem-solving and critical thinking skills through challenging activities. Enhancing curiosity and environmental exploration.

language.title: Language Development
language.desc: Improving oral language skills through discussion, storytelling, and singing. Developing listening skills and understanding simple instructions.

social_emotional.title: Social and Emotional Development
social_emotional.desc: Building social skills through playing together, sharing, and cooperation. Developing emotion management skills and empathy towards others.

creativity.title: Creativity Development
creativity.desc: Expressing oneself through art (drawing, coloring, forming). Developing creativity through music, movement, and drama.

values.title: Value And Moral Education
values.subtitle: Islamic values integrated into daily learning activities and character building programs that shape responsible citizens.

trips.title: Field Educational Trips
trips.desc: We connect learning to reality through rich field visits organized twice a year to educational places that stimulate curiosity and exploration.

collaborative_activities.title: STEAM projects and collaborative activities

family_participation.title: Open days and family participation

teaching_methods.title: Our Teaching Methodology
teaching_methods.subtitle: AGS teaching implementation integrates several approaches to facilitate children's holistic development

montessori.title: Montessori Method
montessori.desc: Emphasizes independent learning and exploration, allowing children to discover concepts at their own pace in a prepared environment that supports autonomy and self-directed activity.

cambridge.title: Cambridge Method
cambridge.desc: Focuses on developing critical thinking and problem-solving skills through a systematic curriculum that encourages analytical thinking and deep conceptual understanding.

nurul_bayan.title: Nurul Bayan Method
nurul_bayan.desc: Deepens Quranic learning through an approach emphasizing reading and repetition of sacred words and verses to shape children's spiritual character with proper pronunciation and tajweed.

project_based.title: Project-Based Learning
project_based.desc: Encourages children to collaborate, think creatively, and develop social skills through projects relevant to daily life, fostering teamwork and practical application of knowledge.

assessment.title: Assessment Policy
assessment.subtitle: AGS Kindergarten Assessment Policy is designed to comprehensively monitor children's progress through multiple methods

exams.title: Examinations
exams.desc: Assess cognitive abilities through structured tests designed for age-appropriate evaluation.

projects.title: Project Assessment
projects.desc: Evaluate children's ability to apply knowledge and skills in practical, real-world contexts through hands-on projects.

reports.title: Periodic Reports
reports.desc: Monitor children's development through regular progress reports shared with parents to track growth over time.

cambridge_standards.title: Cambridge Standards
cambridge_standards.desc: We use Cambridge resources in learning activities to assess children's abilities based on international standards, ensuring global quality benchmarks.

assessment.conclusion: With this comprehensive implementation, the assessment policy provides accurate information about children's abilities and helps teachers and parents support their development effectively.

primary_curriculum.title: Primary School Academic System
primary_curriculum.subtitle: Our primary curriculum is designed to integrate global values with faith, logic with emotion, knowledge with character
primary_curriculum.intro: At Arabic Global School (AGS), primary school is not just an academic stage, but a crucial period in forming a child's identity, mind, and soul. We believe that true education not only teaches knowledge, but also cultivates love of learning, thinking ability, and noble moral values.

cambridge.title: Cambridge International Curriculum
cambridge.desc: Applied to four main subjects: English, Science, Mathematics, and Computer (ICT). This curriculum emphasizes development of Higher Order Thinking Skills through exploration, discussion, and real practice. Through this approach, students grow confident in using English, thinking analytically in science, understanding mathematics deeply, and using technology intelligently and safely.
cambridge.goal: Our goal is to produce learners who think critically, creatively, and independently — learning not just for grades, but for life.

nurul_bayan.title: Noor Al-Bayan Method
nurul_bayan.desc: Our main method for Quranic and Tajweed learning, where students learn to read the Quran with proper tajweed, understand meanings, and cultivate love for the Kalamullah. Learning is conducted engagingly with phonetic, visual, and contextual approaches.
focus: Introduction to makhraj and characteristics of letters
Reading with natural tartil without rigid spelling
nurul_bayan.achievement: By the end of grade 6, students are expected to have memorized two to five juz, and understand the Quranic values and messages contained within. In Noor Al-Bayan, we plant love of the Quran in hearts before tongues.

ico.title: ICO Curriculum (International Curriculum Organization)
ico.desc: Used for Arabic Language and Islamic Education subjects. This is a global curriculum balanced between knowledge, faith, and quality language.
focus: Developing speaking, reading, and writing abilities in Fusha Arabic
Understanding Islamic values practically and relevant to daily life
Building positive character that respects Allah, fellow humans, and the environment
ico.philosophy: ICO curriculum teaches children to practice Islam with love and character, not just memorization.

merdeka.title: National Merdeka Curriculum
merdeka.desc: As part of our vision to combine national identity with global excellence, AGS implements the Merdeka Curriculum endorsed by the Indonesian Ministry of Education.
focus: Strengthening Pancasila Student Profile: faithful, independent, collaborative, and creative
merdeka.outcome: With this approach, students grow as individuals proud of their Indonesian identity, yet possessing global spirit and perspective.

desc.part1: Arabic Global School (AGS) was established to be a leading educational model that integrates academic excellence with Islamic moral values. From the beginning, the founders recognized the importance of creating a school that not only focuses on academic achievement but also builds character, instills respect, compassion, and integrity in every student.
desc.part2: Founded on the belief that every child is unique and has extraordinary potential, AGS embraces personal excellence by providing a learning environment that supports students to develop according to their talents and interests. We are built on the spirit of collaboration, not competition, creating a collaborative classroom atmosphere where children learn to support one another in achieving collective success.
desc.part3: What sets Arabic Global School apart: trilingual education approach (Arabic, English, Indonesian) used naturally in daily learning; integration of international curricula (ICO and Cambridge) with Indonesia's Merdeka Curriculum and Quranic moral values; consistent character formation; creative and collaborative learning environment; and modern educational technology implementation.
desc.part4: We are pursuing BAN-S/M accreditation, Cambridge International School certification, ICO certification for Arabic and Islamic Education, and have begun implementing the Merdeka Curriculum principles. Through partnerships with International Curricula Organization (ICO), Cambridge Assessment International Education, and the Indonesian Ministry of Education, we ensure world-class education quality.

vision.title: A Leading Educational Model Uniting Academic Excellence with Moral Values
vision.desc: To be a leading educational model that unites academic excellence with moral values cultivation, respects individual differences of each student, and prepares a confident and conscious generation ready to face future challenges.

mission.title: Supporting Students to Reach Their Potential Through a Value-Based Learning Environment
mission.desc: We support students in achieving their full potential through a value-based learning environment that encourages creativity and celebrates cultural diversity.

message.title: The director's word
message.subtitle: School Principal
message.msg_content:
“Dear Parents,
We are pleased to welcome you to the International Arabic School - Jakarta, where we build together the future of your children.
At this foundational stage of a child's life, we are committed to providing an education that connects values with knowledge, combines language with skill, and makes the child feel loved and safe. Our school is not just a place for learning; it is a second home for your children.
We believe that every child carries within them the seed of excellence, and our role is to prepare the right
environment for them to grow with confidence, independence, and joy.
Welcome to a warm, open, and renewing school community.“

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.desc: We encourage collaboration among students to achieve common goals, fostering a spirit of mutual support rather than unhealthy competition.

excellence.title: Personal Excellence

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: We instill honesty, responsibility, and a positive sense of shame when doing wrong, so students grow with noble character and strong ethics.
